channel.title: U.S. News - Health
channel.description: Health articles on men's, women's health, and children's health issues. Get health information about the Best Hospitals, Best Health Plans, and diseases and conditions.

item.title: How to Use Medicare’s New Telehealth Coverage
item.dc:creator: Emily Brandon
item.description: Medicare patients can now communicate with their doctor from home.

item.description: Decipher the fine print when caring for a loved one.

item.description: Understand the details involved with health savings accounts before opening one.

item.title: Here's the Difference Between Flexibility and Mobility – and Why It Matters

item.description: Experts explain why you need more than stretching to stay mobile.

item.title: How the Health Care Debate Is Impacting Medicare

item.description: The Trump administration is taking aim at Obamacare through a host of administrative and executive actions, some of which may impact Medicare.
